 2012-10612012-08-31,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of P. THOMAS JENKINS of Waterloo, Ontario, to the position of Special Advisor to the Minister of Public Works and Government Services, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of one year, effective September 4, 2012.
